author: Jessica Warriner
title: This is how COVID-19 progresses from a cold to become a fatal infection in the human body
description: It can start as a slight fever, tiredness and a dry cough. But then as the virus hijacks your body's own cellular material, and you hit the critical 10-day mark, things can take a very serious turn. Scientists are still uncovering what exactly happens to the …
content:
Posted April 16, 2020 06:58:25 From a fever and a runny nose, to needing a ventilator, to no symptoms at all the extremes of COVID-19 can be unpredictable. Key points:
  • Patients can have very mild symptoms for some time
  • The 10-day mark is … [+6701 chars]
